channel.title: Spawn npc face
channel.description:
hello,
when i spawn some npc monsters the wil face to the south-west if they stop walking does any1 knows why of a idea to solve this problem? plz help

item.title: Spawn npc face
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“bruneurk, post:3, topic:523667”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=642213.msg4324697#msg4324697 date=1372700395]
I don’t see how them facing a way when walking is an issue…

But you need to give us more information first.

Ex: Revision, base, etc.
[/quote]

can you add me on skype ? so i can show my screen. thanks[/quote]
That seems rather silly considering you didn’t even answer what I asked.

Read full topic
